description:
These pink birds make a statement on the big mountain and in the lift line. Progressive in the tail allows for easy turn initiation while classic camber underfoot adds to stability and edge hold. Semi-cap construction combines the durability of a sidewall ski with the ability to transfer power of a cap constructed ski. From carving hardpack to straight lining through fresh powder, these freeride beasts are forgiving and easy to navigate over any terrain.

  • Lightweight Poplar wood core feels light underfoot but still has good shock absorption and stability
  • Slightly contoured side cut for stability when carving
  • Front rocker and classic long camber underfoot
  • Titanal mounting plate sets a solid base to better accommodate hybrid bindings
  • Semi cap sidewall construction with carbon fiber and mixed glass laminate for torsion and flex control
  • Sintered graphite base is fast and very durable
name: Black Crows Corvus Freebird 107 Skis - Unisex
